data.comment: Stoke kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Goal! Nick Powell heads Stoke into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 36, James Chester (Stoke) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The first half has been concluded at bet365 Stadium.
The second half is underway in Stoke - Blackburn with the kick-off.
In the minute 64, Stewart Downing is replacing Tom Trybull for Blackburn at bet365 Stadium.
Daniel Butterworth is on a sub for Lewis Holtby for Blackburn.
Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) is making a third substitution, with Tyrhys Dolan replacing Sam Gallagher.
In the minute 65, The home team have replaced Nick Powell with Tashan Oakley-Boothe. This is the first substitution made today by Michael O'Neill.
Michael O'Neill is making the team's second substitution at bet365 Stadium with James McClean replacing Jacob Brown.
The home team replace Steven Fletcher with Sam Vokes.
In the minute 75, Michael O'Neill (Stoke) is making a fourth substitution, with Jordan Thompson replacing Tom Ince.
The away team have replaced Ryan Nyambe with John Buckley. This is the fourth substitution made today by Tony Mowbray.
Harry Chapman is replacing Joe Rothwell for the away team.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
